intro:
A collection of popular party and arcade games.
Set in an immersive arcade environment with multiplayer support for 1 - 4 players on local networks or online.
description:
Party Arcade is a family friendly party game set in a modern virtual arcade. With 13 addictive games, players collect tickets, unlock different equipment skins, and battle against family and friends at home, or online around the world!

Games included:
Air Hockey
Billiards
Bocce Ball
Cup Pong
Hoop Shot
Ping Pong
Slots
Stop Light
Disk-O
Corn Hole
Darts
Skill Ball
Puck Bowling

The premier party game experience for the whole family!
